scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run db:generate
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t openclass-backend -f Dockerfile.backend . && docker build -t openclass-frontend -f Dockerfile.frontend .
scripts.vector:test: cd backend && node -e "console.log('ðŸ§ª Vector search test - OpenAI API:', process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'configured' : 'missing')"
